card.title: REJUVENATING STRIKE
card.body: Return any wounds from your hand, then draw that many cards
card.flavor: What energy do you get from the blow?

card.title: REJUVENATING STRIKE
card.body: Return any wounds from your hand, then draw that many cards
card.flavor: What energy do you get from the blow?

card.title: Lure
card.body: First: Move 1 enemy from an adjacent tile onto your tile.
card.flavor: How do you draw in your prey?
